explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing the task are SoapBar. The clean bar of soap needs to be placed in the bottom right cupboard, the wet soap bar needs to be put into the lower right cabinet, a washed bar of soap needs to be placed in a cabinet, the pink bar of soap needs to be washed in the sink and put in the drawer, and the soap needs to be moved from in between the sink to the cabinet under the sink to the right.
